item.title: atPlatform Documentation
item.description: I want to… # Get Started Follow our getting started guide here Learn the SDK See our SDK Documentation here Learn the platform See our infrastructure overview here Follow a tutorial Find a specific tutorial here Featured Tutorials # @moshere pro An open source end-to-end encrypted file sharing app @dude app Send an end-to-end encrypted duuuuuuude to your friends

item.title: Join the atPlatform developer community
item.description: GitHub Start contributing, This is where the code hits the fan. Discord Learn how it works, Hangout with other developers! Develop and Contribute # You can find out how to contriubte to these docs in our Contribution Guidelines. Hashnode Short technical articles about specific topics! Reddit Join the conversation on our subreddit! Email Support Directly reach our support team for help!

item.title: New experiences powered by the atPlatform
